admins_error_must_specify_time: You must specify a time after the command. E.g.: /{command} 7d.
admins_no_admin_error: You must be an administrator to use this command.
admins_no_permission_error: I'm sorry, but you don't have the required permissions to run this command. Missing permissions: {permissions}

antichannelpin_enabled: Anti channel pin for this chat is now enabled.
antichannelpin_status_disabled: Anti channel pin is currently disabled in this chat.
antichannelpin_status_enabled: Anti channel pin is currently enabled in this chat.
bug_report_empty: You must specify the bug to report, E.g.: /bug your bug.
bug_report_failed: Error, I couldn't send the bug report to the admins of the bot.
bug_report_success: The bug has been successfully reported.
cleanservice_disabled: Delete service messages for this chat is now disabled.
cleanservice_enabled: Delete service messages for this chat is now enabled.
cleanservice_status_disabled: Delete service messages is currently disabled in this chat.
cleanservice_status_enabled: Delete service messages is currently enabled in this chat.
cmd_admins_description: Shows a list of the chat administrators.
cmd_antichannelpin_description: Automatically unpins messages coming from the chat's linked channel.
cmd_ban_description: Bans a user from the chat.
cmd_cleanservice_description: Cleans service messages (E.g.: When a user joins the chat) from the chat.
cmd_coub_description: Sends a random Coub (short video) from search results.
cmd_delfilter_description: Removes a filter from this chat.
cmd_delnote_description: Removes a note from this chat.
cmd_dice_description: Sends a dice and its number.
cmd_donate_description: Gets information on how to donate.
cmd_filter_description: Creates a filter for this chat.
cmd_filters_description: Shows the current filters for this chat.
cmd_gif_description: Sends a random GIF from search results.
cmd_git_description: Gets information from a GitHub profile.
cmd_html_description: Formats the provided text with HTML syntax.
cmd_ip_description: Gets IP information of a domain name or IP address.
cmd_jsondump_description: Gets a dump of the current message in JSON.
cmd_kick_description: Kicks a user from the chat.
cmd_mark_description: Formats the provided text with Markdown syntax.
cmd_mute_description: Mutes a user in the chat.
cmd_note_description: Creates a note for this chat.
cmd_notes_description: Shows saved notes for this chat.
cmd_parsebutton_description: Helps you to parse a button.
cmd_paste_description: Pastes the replied text/document to nekobin.com.
cmd_pin_description: Pins the replied message in chat. loud can be used to enable notification.
cmd_ping_description: Shows the bot delay to send a message.
cmd_print_description: Takes a screenshot of the specified website.
cmd_private_not_allowed: This command cannot be used in a private chat. If you need any help, please use the /help command.
cmd_purge_description: Purges the history up to the replied message.
cmd_pypi_description: Searches for a package in the Python Package Index (PyPI).
cmd_reddit_description: Views the latest posts from the specified Subreddit
cmd_resetwelcome_description: Resets the welcome message to the bot's default welcome message.
cmd_run_description: Runs code in the specified programming language.
cmd_setrules_description: Sets the rules of the chat.
cmd_setwarnsaction_description: Sets the warning action for the chat. You can use the arguments ban/mute/kick.
cmd_setwelcome_description: Sets the welcome message to the specified message. For help with formatting, see /welcomeformat.
cmd_tban_description: Bans a user from chat for the specified time.
cmd_tmute_description: Mutes a user in the chat for the specified time.
cmd_token_description: Gets information from the provided bot token.
cmd_tr_description: Translates the text into the given language (defaults to chat's default language).
cmd_unmute_description: Unmutes a user in the chat.
cmd_unpin_description: Unpins the replied message in chat.
cmd_urldecode_description: Decodes the provided text from URL-safe encoding.
cmd_urlencode_description: Encodes the provided text with URL-safe encoding.
cmd_warns_description: Gets the warnings of the user.
cmd_weather_description: Gets weather information for the given location or city.
cmd_welcome_description: Toggles the welcome message on or off.
cmd_welcomeformat_description: Helps you format the welcome message.
cmd_yt_description: Searches YouTube for the given query.
cmd_ytdl_description: Downloads a YouTube video or audio from the given name or URL.
cmds_list_group_help: Please use the command in a private chat or click the button below to see the available commands.
cmds_list_select_category: Please select a category to see the available commands.

welcome_format_help_msg: The message can be formatted in HTML format or with Telegram's built-in text formatter. You can use the /html command to verify that your HTML is correct. You can use these arguments for the welcome message: - {id} to show the user ID in the welcome message. - {username} to show the user's username in the welcome message. If the user has no username, the bot shows a mention. - {first_name} to show the user's name in the welcome message. - {full_name} or {name} to show the user's full name in the welcome message. - {mention} to mention the user in the welcome message. - {chat_title} or {title} to show the chat title in the welcome message. - {count} to show the chat member count in the welcome message. To add buttons, you can use [button text](buttonurl:button link). To add more buttons on the same line, you can add :same after the link, like this: [button text](buttonurl:button link:same).
welcome_mode_disable: The welcome message for {chat_title} is now disabled.
welcome_mode_enable: The welcome message for {chat_title} is now enabled.
welcome_reset: The welcome message for {chat_title} has been set back to the bot's default welcome message.
welcome_set_empty: You must specify the welcome message, e.g.: /setwelcome your welcome message. For help with formatting, click here.
welcome_set_error: There was an error, and the welcome message could not be set. Error: {error}
welcome_set_success: The welcome message for {chat_title} has been set successfully.
ytdl_button_denied: This button is not for you.
ytdl_file_too_big: Sorry! I can't download this media because it exceeds my 200MB upload limit.
